          <title>
            <string language="fr">Réfraction de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light refraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helle Brechung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Refraction claro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rifrazione chiara</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά διάθλαση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Refracción ligera</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme prouve que la réfraction de la lumière a  lieu quand la lumière passe d'une substance dans une autre substance, dans ce cas-ci de l'eau à l'air.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that light refraction takes place when light passes from a substance into another substance, in this case from water to air.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">air</string>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">angles</string>
            <string language="en">Angles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fléchissant</string>
            <string language="en">bending</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">bornes</string>
            <string language="en">boundaries</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">normale</string>
            <string language="en">normal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayons</string>
            <string language="en">rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réfraction</string>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">l'eau</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß helle Brechung, wenn 
Licht von einer Substanz in eine andere Substanz überschreitet, in 
diesem Fall von Wasser zu Luft stattfindet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que o refraction claro 
ocorre quando a luz passa de uma substância em uma outra substância,
neste caso da água ao ar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che la rifrazione chiara 
avviene quando la luce passa da una sostanza in un'altra sostanza, in 
questo caso da acqua ad aria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι η ελαφριά διάθλαση 
πραγματοποιείται όταν περνά το φως από μια ουσία σε μια άλλη 
ουσία, σε αυτήν την περίπτωση από το ύδωρ στον αέρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que la refracción ligera 
ocurre cuando la luz pasa de una sustancia en otra sustancia, en este 
caso del agua al aire.</string>
          </description>
